summary: This bill, HR 4465, aims to update and correct technical errors in chapters 4, 10, and 131 of Title 5 of the United States Code. It incorporates recent amendments to these chapters, ensuring they reflect current laws, particularly those enacted after October 19, 2021. The bill primarily focuses on updating definitions, reporting requirements, and procedures related to Inspectors General and federal advisory committees, and financial disclosure information for federal judges.
